The study found that only dystrophic adult axons were susceptible to macrophage "attack."
There was no evidence of regeneration in axons after the depletion of infiltrating macrophages in the study.
The document does not provide any information about the effectiveness of graduated compression stockings in preventing deep vein thrombosis in patients with acute stroke.
